name: Sickle Marathon
description:
Sypnosis

Is a game about tapping multiple times the interact button (space or south button on gamepad) to try to cover as much distance while removing roots along the way

This game was made in 4 days (but I have to say 2 because I got busy at work and studying) for the Caracas Game Jam 2023 with the theme of... ROOTS!!!

Credicts

Masa500 - Twitter/ Newgrounds

Controls

Keyboard

Interact : Space

GamePad

Interact : South button
